full_description:
Power Guard 1KVA 1000VA 900W Online UPS

The Power Guard 1KVA 1000VA 900W Online UPS is a reliable and effective way to guarantee that vital systems have a constant power supply. Capable of supporting loads up to 1000 VA or 900 W, it offers dependable power backup for delicate equipment. It maximizes energy use by operating at high efficiency, delivering 87% in AC mode and 83% in battery mode. It is compatible with a range of power sources thanks to its input voltage range of 110–280 VAC and frequency range of 46 Hz–54 Hz and 56 Hz–64 Hz. With three 12V/8.2Ah batteries, the Power Guard 1000VA Online UPS ensures rapid recovery with a normal recharge period of 4 hours to 90% capacity. The online UPS has LED indicators for monitoring UPS status, load level, battery level, input/output voltage, and fault circumstances, giving comprehensive system status information. The alarm features of the Power Guard 1KVA Online UPS notify users of defects, low battery, overload, and battery mode, enabling prompt resolution of such problems. Its easy interaction with Windows, Linux, and Mac systems is made possible by Smart RS-232 management support, which improves monitoring and control capabilities. The Power Guard 1KVA Online UPS is a great option for protecting vital equipment in a variety of applications because it combines dependability, efficiency, and cutting-edge control features.

Power Guard 6KVA 6000VA 6000W Online UPS

The Power Guard 6KVA 6000VA 6000W Online UPS is a reliable and high-capacity solution that ensures uninterrupted power supply for important systems. It provides sufficient backup power with a load capacity of 6000VA or 6000W and a range of load capabilities, including 5400W and 4800W. The Power Guard 6KVA 6000VA 6000W Online UPS maximizes energy efficiency and lowers operating expenses by delivering 93% in AC mode and 87% in battery mode. It operates with exceptional efficiency. Compatibility with a range of power sources is ensured by its single-phase architecture with ground and a wide input frequency range of 46Hz-54Hz / 56Hz-64Hz. With sixteen 12V/8.2AH batteries, the Power Guard 6KVA 6000VA Online UPS ensures rapid recovery with a normal recharge time of 6 hours to 90% capacity. With its LED indications, the online UPS allows for easy control by providing full monitoring of fault conditions, input/output voltage, load level, battery level, and UPS status. Users can respond to possible problems more quickly thanks to the Power Guard 6000VA Online UPS's alarm features, which quickly alert users of battery mode, low battery, overload, and defects. It easily interfaces with Windows, Linux, and MAC systems and supports Smart RS-232 administration, enabling extensive monitoring and control. SNMP is optional. High capacity, efficiency, and cutting-edge management capabilities make the Power Guard 6KVA Online UPS a great option for protecting vital equipment in a variety of challenging settings.
